attributes.action: Create a 50% tax bracket for those earning over 100,000 pounds per annum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wealthy people have beneffitted disproportionately from Britain's wealth in recent decades.The low levels of income tax on these higher earners,has added to Britain's widening inequality.This rise in tax could be put towards financing hospitals,  schools or to reducing the tax burden on the lowest paid in our society.
